text: Aur agar tum logon ko kahin miya aur biwi ke taaluqqat bigad janey ka andesha ho to ek hakam (arbitrator) mard ke rishtedaaron mein se aur ek aurat ke rishtedaaron mein se muqarrar karo. Woh dono islah karna chahenge to Allah unke darmiyan muwafiqat ki surat nikal dega. Allah sabkuch jaanta hai aur bakhabar hai
